prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how your week is going.  
Don't forget our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Looking forward to it!  
Your delivery has been shipped and is expected to arrive on Tuesday.  
Can you send me the address for the party on Saturday?  
I just wanted to confirm our dinner plans for Friday. Still good for you?  
Your bank statement is ready for viewing in your online account.  
Reminder: Your subscription will renew on the 1st of next month.  
Hey, can you help me with that project later? I could use an extra set of eyes.  
Just wanted to remind you about the dentist appointment on Thursday at 3 PM.  
I’ve just made a reservation for us at that new restaurant you wanted to try.  
Your package has been delivered! Check your front porch.  
Thanks for your help with the presentation today. You did great!  
Can you please send me those documents by the end of the day?  
Your OTP code for the transaction is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
Just a heads up, we’ll be having a team meeting next week to discuss the project.  
I received your message. Let’s touch base tomorrow at noon.  
Please confirm your attendance for the workshop by Friday.  
I saw your post about the hike! Would love to join if you’re still going.  
Your appointment reminder: Haircut at 2 PM on Wednesday.  
Just checking in on you—how did the presentation go?  
Your feedback is valuable! Please fill out the survey by the end of the week.  
I’m running a bit late but should be there in 10 minutes.  
Your monthly payment of $50 has been successfully processed.  
Looking forward to our coffee catch-up next week!  
Is everything okay? I noticed you didn’t respond to my last message.  
Thanks for picking up my groceries! I owe you one.  
Your order has been confirmed and will be ready for pickup tomorrow.  
Congratulations! You’ve been selected to receive a free month of our service.  
Can you let me know if you're available for a quick call later?  
I appreciate your support during this busy time.  
Just wanted to let you know that I’m here if you need to talk.  
The community event is happening this Saturday at the park. Hope to see you there!  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
Hey, I found that book you were looking for! Want to meet up?  
Thanks for the update! I’ll review the changes and get back to you.  
Your prescription is ready for pickup at the pharmacy.  
I’ll be out of the office next week but will respond to emails when I return.  
It was great catching up yesterday! Let’s do it again soon.  
Your feedback on the project was really helpful, thank you!  
I’m here if you need anything during this tough time.  
Quick reminder: The deadline for submissions is approaching!  
I just wanted to say thank you for being such a great friend.  
Your event registration has been confirmed for next month.  
Let’s plan a family dinner soon—I miss everyone!  
Your account has been temporarily locked. Please contact support for assistance.  
I’m excited for our trip next week! Have you packed yet?  
Thanks for the reminder about the potluck! I’ll bring dessert.  
Your hotel booking has been successfully confirmed for the weekend.  
Just checking to see if you received my last email about the proposal.  
I hope you have a great birthday celebration this weekend!
